CaseStudies.title: Valuing the Impact of New Innovations for Aquaculture
CaseStudies.paragraph: Thalassaâ€™s role in this project is to create a digital twin of a fish farm so we can assess the relative value of new innovations our team of 30 partners are working on. Above is a screen shot of the prototype digital twin we are developing with a fish farm in Greece
